notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: C.J.M. and J.W.M. designed this research and wrote the first draft of the manuscript. J.W.M. carried out all computations. C.P. helped with the assessment of disturbance effects and provided constructive comments on the manuscript and helped. V.N. assisted in the use of meteorological data and in writing part of the manuscript. L.R.G. and L.Y. generated the GLOMAP LAI dataset. L.X.H. provided the major part of the nitrogen deposition dataset.
